item.title: Getting started typescript minimal project
item.description: Create project structure and install nessess 1mkdir -p ~/code/exercise/ts-demo && cd "$_" 2npm init 3mkdir src 4touch tsconfig.json 5npm i --save-dev @types/node 6npm i --save-dev @types/express 7npm i --save-dev @types/mocha 8npm i express 9npm i nodemon The src/App.ts content 1import * as express from 'express' 2 3class App { 4 public express 5 6 constructor () { 7 this.express = express() 8 this.mountRoutes() 9 } 10 11 private mountRoutes (): void { 12 const router = express.
